name: LEGO MINDSTORMS EV3 Robot Sound File

description: To create an RSF file with the Sound Editor tool in LEGO MINDSTORMS EV3:
After saving the sound, the software creates an RSF to store it in an .EV3 project. To view your RSF file(s) in a project, go to your project, click the wrench icon, and select the "Sounds" tab.
